channel.title: Runescape Update: Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf
channel.description:
Those of you who have completed Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf may remember discovering a dire threat to the Dwarven city of Keldagrim. Then again, given the nature of that quest, you may have discovered it and not remember. In today's new quest the people of Keldagrim are under threat once again. Dwarves have been going missing, and Commander Veldaban does not have the guards he needs to properly investigate. Volunteer to help him and you'll unravel a mystery with grave consequences for both the city and for Veldaban himself. This time, can you escape with your memory intact? This quest unlocks access to a new mining area in Keldagrim and a combat area with unique drops. We've also released a new story in the Lores and Histories section of the website. The Coat Thief deals with an incident in Commander Veldaban's life that begins the chain of events leading up to the start of the new quest.
So ye, i have 15 hand cannons now, pretty sure price will go up alot on them. I suggest you stock up, these babies have +90 ranged bonus. Also, new mobs drop dragon pickaxe, but it's a multicombat zone and there's always 20+ people with godswords there so gl ever getting a kill.

item.title: Runescape Update: Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:13, topic:301214”][quote author=Frell link=topic=397515.msg2953581#msg2953581 date=1252699315]

[quote=http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?15,16,628,59559447]“How come you used “bad language” in the new quest?”

We’ve changed our writing guidelines for language in new content, because we don’t want to be perceived as a ‘kiddie’ game.

Basically, NPCs in quests can say anything that players can say. You’ll notice ‘damn’ and ‘ass’ aren’t censored when you say them, so NPCs are allowed to say them too.

For the record, the words ‘damn’ and ‘ass’ each occur once in the quest.

~ Mod John A[/quote]

lulz

What word did it say
[/quote]
read the fucking quote maybe?
"the words ‘damn’ and ‘ass’ each occur once in the quest. "[/quote]
owow didnt see that, i was at school and rushing.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Update: Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf

item.title: Runescape Update: Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

"How come you used "bad language" in the new quest?"

We’ve changed our writing guidelines for language in new content, because we don’t want to be perceived as a ‘kiddie’ game.

Basically, NPCs in quests can say anything that players can say. You’ll notice ‘damn’ and ‘ass’ aren’t censored when you say them, so NPCs are allowed to say them too.

For the record, the words ‘damn’ and ‘ass’ each occur once in the quest.

~ Mod John A

lulz

Read full topic
